name: Homeless Resources - CityTeam Connect Program
description: Monday PANTRY 9am to 11am Sit-down BREAKFAST 9am to 11am Tuesday–Friday Sit-down DINNER 5pm to 6pm Monday–Friday HOPE CAFE every 4th Saturday of the month from 3pm to 6pm: serving unhoused neighbors through an elevated dining experience SHOWERS: Mondays (Men Only) 1pm to 3:30pm, Wednesdays (Men & Women) 1pm to 3:30pm & Fridays (Men Only) 1pm to 3:30pm CLOTHING: Monday–Friday from 1-3:30pm GROCERY bags and HYGIENE kits upon request

howToGetIt: For more information, call (415) 861-8688 or email sanfranciscoinfo@cityteam.org.
